mapper.sql: app_id as id, app_title as title, app_text as text, app_releasedate as releaseDate, APP_price as price, app_imageurl as imgURL
tag_name as name, tag_id as id
category_id as id, category_name as name
mapper.select: SELECT t.* FROM (SELECT rownum as r_no, app_id as id, app_title as title, app_text as text, app_releasedate as releaseDate, APP_price as price, app_imageurl as imgURL FROM app_table ORDER BY app_id ) t WHERE r_no between #{start} AND #{end} ORDER by r_no
select tag_id as id, tag_name as name FROM tag_table
SELECT tag.tag_id as id, tag.tag_name as name FROM (SELECT * FROM map_app_tag WHERE app_id = #{app_id} ) map, tag_table tag WHERE map.tag_id = tag.tag_id

SELECT cate.category_id as id, cate.category_name as name FROM ( SELECT * FROM map_app_category WHERE app_id = #{app_id}) map,
category_table cate WHERE map.category_id = cate.category_id

SELECT lang.language_id as id, lang.language_name as name, map.lang_interface as supported_interface, map.lang_voice as supported_voice, map.lang_subtitle as supported_subtitle FROM ( SELECT * FROM map_app_lang WHERE app_id = #{app_id} ) map, Language_table lang WHERE map.language_id = lang.language_id
SELECT comp.company_id as id, comp.company_name as name FROM ( SELECT * FROM map_app_developer WHERE app_id = #{app_id}) map, Company_Table comp WHERE map.developer_id = comp.company_id
SELECT comp.company_id as id, comp.company_name as name FROM ( SELECT * FROM map_app_publisher WHERE app_id = #{app_id}) map, Company_Table comp WHERE map.publisher_id = comp.company_id
SELECT gen.genre_id as id, gen.genre_name as name FROM( SELECT * FROM map_app_genre WHERE app_id = #{app_id}) map, Genre_table gen WHERE map.genre_id = gen.genre_id

SELECT review_writer as writer, review_recommended as isRecommended, review_userplaytime as userPlayTime, review_wdate as wdate, review_text as text, review_app_id as app_id FROM Review_table WHERE review_app_id=#{app_id} AND review_recommended=#{isRecommend}
SELECT genre_id as id, genre_name as name FROM genre_table
SELECT category_id as id, category_name as name FROM category_table
SELECT language_id as id, language_name as name FROM Language_table
SELECT tag_id as id, tag_name as name FROM tag_table WHERE UPPER(tag_name) LIKE UPPER( '%'||#{temp}||'%' )
